original_title: Renaissance Live BBC Sight And Sound
overview: Renaissance, clad in shiny period fashions, took to the stage of Golders Green Hippodrome, to launch the BBCâ€™s Sight & Sound series. The set mostly comprises pristine renditions of earlier faves bereft of any improvisational danger, including Mother Russia, Carpet Of The Sun and Ocean Gypsy.
